nodes.text: The Wirutid were a sentient species of ambulatory fungus. They were hyper-intelligent, and evolved into an outwardly human form that enabled them to secure shelter and trap prey. Shortly before the start of the Clone Wars, a member of the species was present in the Outlander Club on Coruscant when Zam Wesell entered the establishment to hide from the pursuing Jedi Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker. That patron appeared as a white-haired woman wearing a green dress.
